definition: Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
bead/pearl/CL:粒[li4],顆|颗[ke1]
surname Mu
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
clear/bright
agate/cornelian
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]

sentences.english: Mount Everest reaches the dizzy height of 8848 meters.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰8848米的高度让人觉得头晕目眩。

sentences.english: Everest itself is changing, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说，珠穆朗玛峰本身正在变化。

sentences.english: The small hilltop at the back is Everest.
sentences.chinese: 我们身后这个小山头就是珠穆朗玛峰。

sentences.english: Mallory dreamed of being the first man to climb Mount Everest.
sentences.chinese: 马洛里曾梦想成为第一个登上珠穆朗玛峰的人。

sentences.english: Mount qomolangma is the world 's highest peak .
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界第一高峰。

sentences.english: Those bound for Mount Everest will know what we talk about.
sentences.chinese: 曾经开放珠穆朗玛峰的人知道我们在谈论什么。

sentences.english: They organized a climbing expedition to Mt. Everest.
sentences.chinese: 他们组织了珠穆朗玛峰登山队。

sentences.english: The flag of China was raised on the summit of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.chinese: 五星红旗插上了珠穆朗玛峰的顶峰。

sentences.english: She is the first woman who steps on the top of Mount Qomolangma.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个登上珠穆朗玛峰的女人。

sentences.english: Mount Qomolangma is the world's highest peak.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界第一高峰。

sentences.english: Heidi Howkins makes a radio call from Camp Two on the south face of Mount Everest.
sentences.chinese: 在珠穆朗玛峰上的每一步都是充满危险的。

sentences.english: Mt. Everest lies in the Himalaya mountains in the country of Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰位于尼泊尔境内的喜马拉雅山中。

sentences.english: Nestled in the Himalayas, bordering the world's highest peak, Mount Everest, lies tiny landlocked Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰雄踞世界屋脊喜马拉雅山颠。

sentences.english: The yowl of the Yeti echoes from the newly completed Mount Everest.
sentences.chinese: 新近建成的珠穆朗玛峰上不时传来雪人的吼叫。

sentences.english: Can you believe there is someplace/somewhere that is 304 meters taller than Mount Qomolangma?
sentences.chinese: 你相信有一个地方比珠穆朗玛峰还高304米吗？

sentences.english: Three members of the Everest Expedition were killed including a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 三名珠穆朗玛峰探险队员遇难，其中包括一名医生。

definition: abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Himalayas
K2, Mt Qogir or Chogori in Karakorum section of Himalayas
Mt Kilimanjaro in Tanzania
pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: the roof of the world/usually refers to Tibet or Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau 青藏高原[Qing1 Zang4 gao1 yuan2]
Himalayas
pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Mt Kawakarpo (6740 m) in Yunnan, the highest peak of Meri snow mountains 梅里雪山[Mei2 li3 xue3 shan1]
Lhotse Mountain, between Tibet and Nepal
Mt Shishapangma or Xixiabangma in Tibet (8012 m)
to climb/to pull oneself up/to clamber/to scale/fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger
height above sea level/elevation
Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet/also called Mount Kailash
Mt Haba (Nakhi: golden flower), in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Chola Mountains in Sichuan
Dhaulagiri, mountain massif in the Himalayas
